volatility.txt2: Portfolio Volatility is in line with both Composite Index and Sensex
volatility.txt3: Standard Deviation is a measure of riskiness of your portfolio. Higher Standard Deviation signifies higher risk than market

beta.txt2: Your Portfolio has a Beta of 1.45 with Sensex
beta.txt3: High Beta portfolios generally rise and fall by a larger proportion than market

var.txt1: Your Portfolio VAR is Rs 18.7 K
var.txt2: VAR is calculated at 99% confidence interval
var.txt3: This means that there 1% chance that on any day your portfolio can lose more than Rs 18.7 K

return.txt2: Portfolio has generated Superior risk adjusted returns vs composite index signifying that you have generated higher returns per unit of risk

allocation.txt1: 38.12% of your portfolio is allocated to small or micro cap stocks
allocation.txt2: These stocks are in general more volatile and are considered riskier
